DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigation determine patient-reported performance-based outcome , specifically muscle function kinematic/kinetic outcome , four different surgical total knee prostheses individual follow TKA . Change score determine base patient-reported outcome , kinematic/kinetic data , knee extension strength/power , static/dynamic balance control , mobility measure functional performance test functional task ( i.e . walking , ascending/descending stair , sit-to-stand ) . After evaluate pattern change lower-extremity function , investigator better prepared address residual functional impairment prognostic factor link maximal recovery two year .
DOC.criteria: adult > 40 year age schedule primary TKA previous TKA , need perform opposite leg least 3 month prior current TKA willing return followup visit willing able transport UOC Skeletal Muscle Exercise Research Facility ( SMERF ) , Department Physical Therapy study site schedule research followup appointment adult previous additional orthopaedic , neurological , visual surgical condition may affect gait balance
